title: $500M Flows MIA for Month: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 11, 2025

title: Here’s Why Bitcoin is Falling Despite the Fed's Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Analysts say the Fed’s rate cut was priced in, driving Bitcoin lower as risks like sticky inflation and the 2026 election cycle mount.

title: Disgraced Terraform Labs Founder Do Kwon Faces Sentencing Today
contentSnippet: The upcoming sentencing comes after the South Korean entrepreneur pleaded guilty to defrauding investors in August.

title: Sky's Keel Starts $500M Investment Campaign to Boost RWAs on Solana
contentSnippet: The Tokenization Regatta aims to allocate funds and support to projects bringing tokenized real-world assets to the Solana network.

title: Marketnode, Lion Global Bring Singapore-Vaulted Gold Fund Onchain on Solana
contentSnippet: The fund offers exposure to physical gold bars vaulted and insured in Singapore, with traditional custody and an option for in-kind redemption.

title: ‘Santa rally’ now unlikely as bitcoin slips after Fed delivers ‘hawkish cut’: analysts
contentSnippet: Analysts said Powell's messaging injected "fresh uncertainty," keeping conviction thin and muting the impact of positive ETF demand.

title: Revolut and Trust Wallet Launch Instant Crypto Buys in EU With Self-Custody Focus
contentSnippet: The integration allows users to buy crypto and have it sent directly to their Trust Wallet, a self-custodial app, giving them full control of their assets from the moment of purchase.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Traders Seek Catalysts After Bitcoin’s Post-Fed Pullback
contentSnippet: The crypto market slipped to the lower end of its range after the Federal Reserve’s 25bps rate cut failed to spark fresh momentum.

title: UK Bitcoin Company Satsuma Sells 579 of Its 1,199 Bitcoin for $53.2 Million
contentSnippet: The company sells BTC to secure cash for upcoming loan note obligations ahead of its planned uplisting.

title: BTC, Nasdaq Futures Drop as Oracle Earnings Revive AI Bubble Fears
contentSnippet: Oracle shares tanked after the firm revealed an earnings miss.

title: UK financial authority to prioritize stablecoin payments in 2026
contentSnippet: The FCA recently opened a regulatory sandbox, inviting issuers to experiment with their stablecoin solutions.

title: Bybit CEO Ben Zhou on perps, RWAs, and what’s next for 2026
contentSnippet: Bybit CEO Ben Zhou talks about the challenges of building the exchange from a derivatives-first startup into a full-stack CEX.

title: A16z crypto launches South Korea office; ex-Monad APAC lead to head expansion
contentSnippet: Sungmo Park, former APAC lead at Monad Foundation and Polygon Labs, has been named to head a16z's efforts in the region.

title: ‘Ethereum has already bottomed’: Tom Lee’s BitMine reportedly adds $112 million in ETH to treasury
contentSnippet: Lee claimed that the ISM Index moving back above 50 is a positive signal and has "historically been associated with super cycle moves in Bitcoin and Ethereum."

title: Gemini Approved by CFTC to Offer U.S. Prediction Markets, Stock Surges Nearly 14%
contentSnippet: The decision allows Gemini’s affiliate to offer supervised event-contract markets to U.S. users, adding regulated forecasting tools as the firm expands its product lineup.

title: Ether, Dogecoin, Solana Slide as Bitcoin Fails to Sustain Early-Week Breakout
contentSnippet: The pullback followed Tuesday's brief spike above $94,500, a move that triggered a minor short squeeze but failed to break the resistance that has capped bitcoin for most of the past three weeks.

title: Crypto Drop Wipes Out $370M in Bullish Bets as BTC, ETH Give Back Gains
contentSnippet: Binance, Hyperliquid, and Bybit were the most affected exchanges, comprising 72% of all forced unwinds.

title: Gemini Gets CFTC Approval to Launch Prediction Markets in US
contentSnippet: The CFTC license will let Gemini offer event contracts in the U.S., joining Kalshi and Polymarket in a booming market.

title: Bhutan Launches Sovereign Gold-Backed Token on Solana
contentSnippet: The launch adds to Bhutan’s broader blockchain push, including Bitcoin reserves, Binance Pay integration and hydro-powered BTC mining.

title: Bitcoin Traders Bet on 2026 Boom, Not a Santa Rally, Following Fed Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Bitcoin options traders are tempering expectations for a Santa rally and are now looking to $130,000 and $180,000 strikes in Q1, 2026.

title: Hong Kong Cardinal Calls AI a 'Gift From God' as Asian Bishops Mull Ethical Challenges
contentSnippet: Regional church leaders met to establish guidelines for the use of AI in ministry, education, and content.

title: Bitcoin Exchange Paxful Agrees to Plead Guilty, Hit With $7.5 Million in Penalties
contentSnippet: Authorities say Paxful was used by money launderers and other criminals—and that the Bitcoin exchange knew about it.

title: Official Trump Crypto Game Revealed With $1 Million in Solana Meme Coin Rewards
contentSnippet: Trump Billionaires Club on iOS and Android will launch by year's end and offer $1 million worth of the president's meme coin as rewards.

title: Gemini wins CFTC approval for prediction market, may expand into crypto futures, options and perps
contentSnippet: Gemini's Designated Contract Market will offer binary event contracts and may expand into other CFTC-regulated derivatives.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves Bitcoin Ahead of Potential Record IPO
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's private aerospace company SpaceX moved more of its Bitcoin holdings on Wednesday ahead of reported blockbuster IPO plans.

title: Crypto Debanking and Efforts to 'Weaponize Finance' Must End, Says Top US Banking Regulator
contentSnippet: Major U.S. banks denied services to crypto and other lawful businesses based on industry rather than risk, an OCC preliminary report finds.

title: A16z-backed Lead Bank adds Loop Crypto to inner circle with eye on scaling stablecoins and payments
contentSnippet: Lead Bank is a 97-year-old community bank that has, in recent years, pivoted to serving fintechs and crypto companies.

title: Bitcoin and ETH whipsaw after Fed’s quarter-point cut and caution on further easing
contentSnippet: Traders are shifting expectations, with futures markets pricing a nearly 40% chance of another cut by March despite the Fed’s cautious tone.

title: The Daily: Silk Road bitcoin wallets wake up, SEC Chair Atkins signals quick action on crypto priorities, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: CryptoQuant says bitcoin could reach $112,000 if Fed turns dovish and key resistance levels break
contentSnippet: The firm said bitcoin could move toward $112,000 in the near term, but only if it clears two key resistance levels first.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
